snippet: Departing Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton noted  that both Iran and Russia continued to provide military support to the Syrian government, raising concerns that the conflict is becoming a regional one.
abstract: Departing Sec of State Hillary Rodham Clinton says that both Iran and Russia continue to provide military support to Syrian government, raising concerns that conflict is becoming regional one.
lead_paragraph: Departing Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton noted  that both Iran and Russia continued to provide military support to the Syrian government, raising concerns that the conflict is becoming a regional one.

headline.seo: Clinton Reviews Tenure, Focusing on Syria and Iran
headline.main: Clinton Reviews Tenure, Focusing on Syria and Iran
headline.print_headline: Clinton Sees Signs of More Iran Aid to Syria
